thread.title: BRIEF-Invesco Says Preliminary Average Active Aum For Quarter Through March 31 Were $747.1 Bln

title: BRIEF-Invesco Says Preliminary Average Active Aum For Quarter Through March 31 Were $747.1 Bln
text:
April 10, 2018 / 8:29 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Invesco Says Preliminary Average Active Aum For Quarter Through March 31 Were $747.1 Bln Reuters Staff 
April 10 (Reuters) - Invesco Ltd: 
* INVESCO LTD ANNOUNCES MARCH 31, 2018 ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT 
* REPORTED PRELIMINARY MARCH MONTH-END ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT (AUM) OF $934.2 BILLION, A DECREASE OF 1.2% MONTH OVER MONTH 
* PRELIMINARY AVERAGE TOTAL AUM FOR QUARTER THROUGH MARCH 31 WERE $951.3 BILLION 
* PRELIMINARY AVERAGE ACTIVE AUM FOR QUARTER THROUGH MARCH 31 WERE $747.1 BILLION. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
